snippet: Ecuador has the right to sue a pair of fugitive bankers in courts in the United States to recover millions of dollars that the men are accused of embezzling, a Florida appellate court has ruled.
abstract: Florida appellate court rules that government of Ecuador has the right to sue a pair of fugitive bankers, Roberto and William Isaias, in courts in the United States to recover $600 million that the government accuses them of having embezzled from Filanbanco.
lead_paragraph: Ecuador has the right to sue a pair of fugitive bankers in courts in the United States to recover millions of dollars that the men are accused of embezzling, a Florida appellate court has ruled.

headline.main: Government of Ecuador Can Sue Fugitive Bankers in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Ecuador: Government Can Sue Fugitive Bankers in U.S.
